module.name: design_product_data_management
module.name.french: Gestion des donnÃ©es du produit de conception
module.keywords: module, product data management, approval, identification, test select

mapping.changes.description: Mapping specifications has been updated globally according to ARM and MIM EXPRESS schemas modifications.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of product data management in the context of electrical and electromechanical design processes.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Activity method assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1249;
items within the scope of application module Attribute classification, ISO/TS 10303-1246;
items within the scope of application module Characterizable object, ISO/TS 10303-1765;
items within the scope of application module Classification with attributes, ISO/TS 10303-1111;
items within the scope of application module Generic material aspects, ISO/TS 10303-1681;
items within the scope of application module Information rights, ISO/TS 10303-1241;
items within the scope of application module Item definition structure, ISO/TS 10303-1345;
items within the scope of application module Pre defined product data management specializations, ISO/TS 10303-1760;
items within the scope of application module Product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1231;
items within the scope of application module Requirement assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1233;
items within the scope of application module Requirement view definition relationship, ISO/TS 10303-1142;
items within the scope of application module Specification control, ISO/TS 10303-1112;
items within the scope of application module Test select product, ISO/TS 10303-1757.

aa.refpath_extend: action_method_items *> design_pdm_action_method_items design_pdm_action_method_items = product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship => product_definition_usage => assembly_component_usage

product_definition configuration_design_item = product_definition configuration_design.design -> configuration_design configuration_design.configuration -> configuration_item configuration_item.item_concept -> product_concept
characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition

ae.refpath: retention <= action {action <- action_assignment.assigned_action action_assignment action_assignment.role -> object_role object_role.name = 'retention'}

aa.refpath: retention <= action date_item = action date_item <- applied_date_assignment.items[i] applied_date_assignment <= date_assignment {date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name = 'earliest end definition'} date_assignment.assigned_date -> date date => calendar_date

retention <= action date_and_time_item = action date_and_time_item <- applied_date_and_time_assignment.items[i] applied_date_and_time_assignment <= date_and_time_assignment {date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name = 'earliest end definition'} date_and_time_assignment.assigned_date_and_time -> date_and_time

retention <= action event_occurrence_item = action event_occurrence_item <- applied_event_occurrence_assignment.items[i] applied_event_occurrence_assignment <= event_occurrence_assignment {event_occurrence_assignment.role -> event_occurrence_role event_occurrence_role.name='earliest end definition'} event_occurrence_assignment.assigned_event_occurrence -> (|event_occurrence|) (event_occurrence => relative_event_occurrence)

retention <= action time_interval_item = action time_interval_item <- applied_time_interval_assignment.items[i] applied_time_interval_assignment <= time_interval_assignment {time_interval_assignment.role -> time_interval_role time_interval_role.name = 'minimum retention period'} time_interval_assignment.assigned_time_interval -> time_interval => time_interval_with_bounds time_interval_with_bounds.duration -> time_measure_with_unit

retention <= action date_item = action date_item <- applied_date_assignment.items[i] applied_date_assignment <= date_assignment {date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name = 'latest end definition'} date_assignment.assigned_date -> date date => calendar_date

retention <= action date_and_time_item = action date_and_time_item <- applied_date_and_time_assignment.items[i] applied_date_and_time_assignment <= date_and_time_assignment {date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name = 'latest end definition'} date_and_time_assignment.assigned_date_and_time -> date_and_time

retention <= action event_occurrence_item = action event_occurrence_item <- applied_event_occurrence_assignment.items[i] applied_event_occurrence_assignment <= event_occurrence_assignment {event_occurrence_assignment.role -> event_occurrence_role event_occurrence_role.name='latest end definition'} event_occurrence_assignment.assigned_event_occurrence -> (|event_occurrence|) (event_occurrence => relative_event_occurrence)

retention <= action time_interval_item = action time_interval_item <- applied_time_interval_assignment.items[i] applied_time_interval_assignment <= time_interval_assignment {time_interval_assignment.role -> time_interval_role time_interval_role.name = 'maximum retention period'} time_interval_assignment.assigned_time_interval -> time_interval => time_interval_with_bounds time_interval_with_bounds.duration -> time_measure_with_unit

retention <= action date_item = action date_item <- applied_date_assignment.items[i] applied_date_assignment <= date_assignment {date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name = 'start definition'} date_assignment.assigned_date -> date date => calendar_date

retention <= action date_and_time_item = action date_and_time_item <- applied_date_and_time_assignment.items[i] applied_date_and_time_assignment <= date_and_time_assignment {date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name = 'start definition'} date_and_time_assignment.assigned_date_and_time -> date_and_time

retention <= action event_occurrence_item = action event_occurrence_item <- applied_event_occurrence_assignment.items[i] applied_event_occurrence_assignment <= event_occurrence_assignment {event_occurrence_assignment.role -> event_occurrence_role event_occurrence_role.name='start definition'} event_occurrence_assignment.assigned_event_occurrence -> (|event_occurrence|) (event_occurrence => relative_event_occurrence)

retention <= action <- action_assignment.assigned_action action_assignment => applied_action_assignment applied_action_assignment.items[i] -> time_interval_item *> pdm_time_interval_item pdm_time_interval_item = action

product <- product_related_product_category <= product_category {(product_category.name='application control') (product_category.name='assembly') (product_category.name='boxed') (product_category.name='collection') (product_category.name='completely knocked down') (product_category.name='continuous') (product_category.name='detail') (product_category.name='discrete') (product_category.name='in process') (product_category.name='inseparable assembly') (product_category.name='prototype') (product_category.name='raw material') (product_category.name='raw material by area') (product_category.name='raw material by length') (product_category.name='raw material by volume') (product_category.name='regulated') (product_category.name='safety') (product_category.name='service') (product_category.name='tool')}
